<file path="source.cs">
using System
namespace Constructs.Simple02
class BankAccount:
    dynamic BalanceChanged
    readonly string AccountNumber
    readonly decimal Balance
    void BankAccount(string accountNumber, decimal openingBalance)
    void Deposit(decimal amount)
    void Withdraw(decimal amount)
    override string ToString()
struct Money:
    void Money(decimal amount, string currency)
    readonly decimal Amount
    readonly string Currency
    bool Equals(other Money)
    override int GetHashCode()
    override string ToString()
class SavingsAccount : BankAccount:
    readonly decimal InterestRate
    void SavingsAccount(string accountNumber, decimal interestRate, decimal openingBalance)
    void AddMonthlyInterest()
</file>
